formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ResetCDR' =-
[Synopsis] Resets the Call Data Record
[Description] ResetCDR([options]): This application causes the Call Data Record to be reset. Options: w -- Store the current CDR record before resetting it. a -- Store any stacked records. v -- Save CDR variables.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -10,3 +10,4 @@ w -- Store the current CDR record before resetting it. a -- Store any stacked records. v -- Save CDR variables. + e -- Enable CDR only (negate effects of NoCDR).
